description: Even on the last day tempers flare. An ongoing clash between bluecollar employees and management comes to a 'head' when tattooed,pierced and hairy Ettienne Gray and the stocky muscle-stud DominikRider unavoidably meet in the stairwell. Dominik looks scared asEttienne corners him. Scared turns to surprise when Ettienne stripsDominik down and roughs him up by giving him the raunchiest ride ofhis life. Dominik is in pure ecstasy as he rides Ettienne's big lengthycock! The two swallow each others seed and snowball it back intoeach others mouth.
title: Swallow Seed Co, Scene #02
